document.full_text: president ali abdullah saleh left for treatment a day after being wounded in an attack, saudi officials said. news reports point to the vice president as yemen's acting leader.
document.title: citing medical needs, yemeni leader goes to saudi arabia
lines_and_colors: president ali abdullah saleh left for treatment a day after being wounded in an attack, saudi officials said. news reports point to the vice president as yemen's acting leader.
